name: locations_v2_search_deprecated
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool hotels.
Tool description: This API helps to query rooms, price, facilities, policities, etc information from many hotels around the world to create a travelling site/application, such as : hotels.com
API description: Searches for related locations and suggestions based on the provided query, locale, and currency.

query.description: Name of the country, city, district, place, etc., to search for.

locale.description: The language code for the search results. Defaults to 'en_US'.

currency.description: The currency code for the search results. Defaults to 'USD'.
